title: Behind The Idea #42: Breaking Down Amazon's Financials W/Marc Pentacoff
description: We're continuing to look at Amazon with Part 2 of our miniseries on the company. We bring on Marc Pentacoff, a Seeking Alpha editor and financial analysis wizard, to dissect Amazon's financial statements. How does their world-beating success translate to their numbers? How do we know it's still day 1 at Amazon? How should value investors look at these? We break it down.
itunes:title: Breaking Down Amazon's Financials W/Marc Pentacoff
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: How can a fundamental based investor translate Amazon's financial statements to their business success and vice versa?
